programs.description: Comprehensive computer science program covering algorithms, AI, software engineering, cybersecurity, and data science. Strong industry partnerships with Google, Microsoft, and local tech companies.

requirements.academic: A-Level: AAA/AAB with H2 Math. Polytechnic: GPA 3.6+. IB: 38+ points
requirements.prerequisites: Strong mathematics background required. H2 Math or equivalent.
requirements.portfolio: Optional: Coding portfolio, hackathon participation, personal projects

programs.career_outcomes: Software Engineer, AI Engineer, Data Scientist, Cybersecurity Analyst, Cloud Architect. Average starting salary: S$4,500-6,000/month
programs.unique_features: Industry attachment program, overseas exchange opportunities, Smart Nation initiatives involvement, strong alumni network in tech sector
programs.singapore_context: Aligned with Singapore's Smart Nation goals. High demand in local tech sector (Grab, Shopee, Sea Group, GovTech). Government actively recruiting CS graduates.

programs.description: Engineering-focused CS program with strong emphasis on AI, robotics, and IoT. Known for cutting-edge research labs and industry collaboration.

requirements.academic: A-Level: AAA/AAB with H2 Math and H2 Physics/Chemistry. Polytechnic: GPA 3.5+
requirements.prerequisites: H2 Math, H2 Physics or Chemistry required

programs.career_outcomes: AI Engineer, Robotics Engineer, Software Developer, IoT Specialist, Research Scientist. Starting: S$4,200-5,800/month
programs.unique_features: Access to NTU's world-class AI research labs, partnerships with industry leaders, overseas immersion programs, Renaissance Engineering Programme option
programs.singapore_context: Strong ties to Singapore's AI Singapore initiative. Many graduates join A*STAR, DSTA, and local tech unicorns.

programs.description: Prestigious business program with specializations in Finance, Marketing, Analytics, and Strategy. Strong links to Singapore's financial sector and MNCs.

requirements.academic: A-Level: AAA/AAB with H2 Math preferred. Polytechnic: GPA 3.7+. IB: 38+ points
requirements.prerequisites: H2 Math recommended but not mandatory. Strong quantitative skills preferred.
requirements.portfolio: Leadership roles, business competitions, entrepreneurial ventures valued

programs.career_outcomes: Financial Analyst, Management Consultant, Investment Banker, Marketing Manager, Business Analyst. Starting: S$4,000-6,500/month
programs.unique_features: Internship with top banks/MNCs, exchange programs with Wharton/INSEAD, entrepreneurship incubator access, BBA-Honours specializations
programs.singapore_context: Direct pipeline to Singapore's banking sector (DBS, UOB, OCBC), consulting firms (McKinsey, BCG, Bain), and regional MNC headquarters.

programs.description: Unique blend of business and technology. Focuses on enterprise systems, digital transformation, analytics, and IT consulting. City campus with strong industry connections.

requirements.academic: A-Level: AAB/ABB with H2 Math. Polytechnic: GPA 3.5+. IB: 36+ points
requirements.prerequisites: H2 Math or strong mathematics background
requirements.portfolio: Tech projects, business case competitions, leadership experience

programs.career_outcomes: Business Analyst, IT Consultant, Digital Transformation Manager, Data Analyst, Product Manager. Starting: S$4,200-5,800/month
programs.unique_features: 12-week mandatory internship, SMU-X experiential learning projects with real companies, city campus networking advantages, strong alumni in consulting
programs.singapore_context: Located in the heart of Singapore's business district. Strong ties to banks, consulting firms, and government agencies undergoing digital transformation.

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science (Data Science and Analytics)
programs.description: Interdisciplinary program combining statistics, computing, and domain knowledge. Prepares students for data-driven decision making roles across industries.

requirements.academic: A-Level: AAA/AAB with H2 Math. Polytechnic: GPA 3.6+. IB: 38+ points
requirements.prerequisites: H2 Math required. Programming experience helpful.
requirements.portfolio: Data science projects, Kaggle competitions, research experience valued

programs.career_outcomes: Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, Business Intelligence Analyst, Quantitative Analyst, AI Researcher. Starting: S$4,500-6,500/month
programs.unique_features: Industry capstone projects, access to NUS supercomputing resources, collaboration with AI Singapore, overseas exchange opportunities
programs.singapore_context: High demand across all sectors - finance, healthcare, logistics, government. Singapore positioning as regional AI hub creates strong job market.

programs.description: Premier accountancy program with CPA Singapore accreditation. Strong focus on analytics, forensics, and technology in accounting.

requirements.academic: A-Level: AAB/ABB with H2 Math preferred. Polytechnic: GPA 3.6+

programs.career_outcomes: Public Accountant, Auditor, Tax Consultant, Financial Analyst, Forensic Accountant. Starting: S$3,600-5,200/month
programs.unique_features: CPA Singapore accreditation pathway, Big 4 internship opportunities, integrated second major options, analytics focus
programs.singapore_context: Singapore is regional financial hub - high demand for accountants in Big 4 (Deloitte, PwC, EY, KPMG), local banks, and MNCs.

programs.description: Innovative program blending finance and technology. Covers blockchain, digital payments, robo-advisors, and financial analytics.

requirements.academic: O-Level: Net ELR2B2 of 15 points or better. Good Math and English.
requirements.prerequisites: Interest in both finance and technology

programs.career_outcomes: FinTech Associate, Digital Banking Officer, Blockchain Developer, Financial Data Analyst. Starting: S$2,300-3,300/month
programs.unique_features: Industry projects with banks and FinTech startups, overseas immersion, internships with financial institutions, blockchain certifications
programs.singapore_context: Singapore positioning as global FinTech hub. MAS actively supporting FinTech innovation. High demand from banks, FinTech startups, and financial services.

programs.program_name: Diploma in Applied Artificial Intelligence & Analytics
programs.description: Cutting-edge AI program focused on machine learning, computer vision, NLP, and AI ethics. Problem-based learning approach.

requirements.academic: O-Level: Net ELR2B2 of 15 points or better. Good Math and English.
requirements.prerequisites: Strong analytical thinking and interest in AI

programs.career_outcomes: AI Developer, Machine Learning Engineer, Data Analyst, AI Consultant. Starting: S$2,400-3,400/month. Progression to university common.
programs.unique_features: Problem-based learning (RP's signature pedagogy), industry projects, AI certifications, access to GPU computing resources
programs.singapore_context: AI Singapore national initiative creating high demand. Graduates feed into tech companies, government agencies (GovTech, DSTA), and startups.
